src:
Polisi Masih Cari Penyebar Pertama Video Porno Mirip Artis Gisel
01 Nov 2019, 19:19 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - Penyidik Polda Metro Jaya masih mengusut kasus pencemaran nama baik yang dilaporkan artis Gisella Anastasia (Gisel). Penyidik saat ini tengah berfokus mencari pengunggah pertama video porno itu.
"Kami masih mencari siapa yang upload pertama. Nanti akan kami lakukan identifikasi terlebih dahulu oleh polisi," kata Kabid Humas Polda Metro Jaya Kombes Argo Yuwono kepada wartawan di Polda Metro Jaya, Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Argo mengatakan hingga saat ini pihaknya belum mendapatkan identitas pelaku yang pertama kali mengunggah video syur tersebut. Penyidik, disebutnya, masih bekerja menyelidiki kasus itu.
"Identitas pelaku belum ya, masih dalam proses, ya," jelas Argo.
Selain itu, Argo mengatakan polisi juga masih mencari saksi-saksi lain dalam kasus tersebut.
"Tentunya penyidik masih mencari saksi ya, saksi ahli perlu kami periksa juga. Kemudian nanti kita bisa mengetahui masuk pidana atau bukan," kata Argo.
Diketahui, video syur tersebut sebelumnya disebarkan oleh sejumlah akun Twitter. Dari Twitter, video itu kemudian tersebar hingga ke grup WhatsApp. Pemeran perempuan dalam video itu juga dikaitkan dengan artis Gisella Anastasia.
Gisel diketahui sudah melaporkan beberapa akun media sosial yang menyebarkan video porno dan dikaitkan dengan dirinya. Laporan polisi itu tertuang pada LP/6864/X/219/PMJ/Dit. Reskrimsus dengan pelapor dirinya sendiri. Terlapor dalam hal ini masih dalam penyelidikan.
Polisi juga sudah memeriksa Gisel pada Rabu, 30 Oktober 2019. Dalam pemeriksaan itu, Gisel juga menyerahkan bukti baru berupa tangkapan layar yang didapat dari media sosial.

(sam/idn)
text:
Police Still Searching for First Spreader of Gisel Artist-like Porn Videos
Nov 01 2019, 19:19 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - Metro Jaya Police Investigators are still investigating defamation cases reported by artist Gisella Anastasia (Gisel). Investigators are currently focusing on finding the first uploader of the porn video.
"We are still looking for who uploaded first. Later we will do identification in advance by the police," said Head of Jakarta Police Public Relations Commissioner Argo Yuwono told reporters at the Jakarta Metropolitan Police, Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019).
Argo said that until now it had not gotten the identity of the perpetrator who first uploaded the exciting video. Investigators, he said, were still working to investigate the case.
"The identity of the perpetrators is not yet, it is still in the process, yes," Argo explained.
In addition, Argo said the police were also still looking for other witnesses in the case.
"Surely investigators are still looking for witnesses, we need to examine expert witnesses as well. Then later we can find out whether they are criminals or not," Argo said.
It is known, the exciting video was previously spread by a number of Twitter accounts. From Twitter, the video then spread to the WhatsApp group. The female actor in the video is also associated with artist Gisella Anastasia.
Gisel is known to have reported several social media accounts that spread pornographic videos and linked to him. The police report was contained in LP / 6864 / X / 219 / PMJ / Dit. Reskrimsus with the reporter himself. Reported in this case is still under investigation.
Police have also examined Gisel on Wednesday, October 30, 2019. During the investigation, Gisel also submitted new evidence in the form of screenshots obtained from social media.

(sam / idn)
